name: M5CardKB for MJ (M5Stack)
commands: --chip esp32 --port %port --baud %baud --before default_reset --after hard_reset write_flash -z --flash_mode dio --flash_freq 80m --flash_size detect 0xe000 %PATH\bin/boot_app0.bin 0x1000 %PATH\bin/bootloader_qio_80m.bin 0x10000 %PATH\M5CardKB_for_MJ.ino.m5stack_core_esp32.bin 0x8000 %PATH\bin/M5CardKB_for_MJ.ino.partitions.bin
